title: President Donald J. Trump Announces his Designation and Intent to Nominate Individuals to Key Administration Posts – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
October 24, 2018
President Donald J. Trump today has designated the following individual to a key position in his Administration: Neil Chatterjee of Kentucky, to be Chair of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission. — President Donald J. Trump today announced his intent to nominate the following individual to a key position in his Administration:George M. Marcus of California, to be a Member of the Board of Directors of the Millennium Challenge Corporation for a term of three years.
